mutants.code:
def is_bravebeart_strongest(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, warriors, horses) = case
        max_horse_strength = max(horses)
        bravebeart_strength = warriors[0] / max_horse_strength
        max_horse_index = horses.index(max_horse_strength)
        horses.pop(max_horse_index)
        warriors.pop(0)
        warriors.sort()
        horses.sort(reverse=True)
        is_strongest = True
        for i in range(N - 1):
            if warriors[i] * horses[i] >= bravebeart_strength:
                is_strongest = False
                break
        if is_strongest:
            results.append('YES')
        else:
            results.append('NO')
    return results
